Detailed Description

The thread helper which downloads the webupdate script and/or packages.

This class is generic and can be used to download anything you need from any URL. It already provides some useful functions like GetDownloadSpeed() and GetRemainingTime() which helps you to create dialogs with progress bars and/or time indicators.

wxString wxDownloadThread::GetDownloadSpeed (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a string containing the current download speed.

The speed is calculated using GetCurrDownloadedBytes and GetElapsedMSec.

wxLongLong wxDownloadThread::GetElapsedMSec (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the number of milliseconds elapsed from the start of the current download.

wxString wxDownloadThread::GetRemainingTime (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a string containing the current time left for this download.

wxDownloadThreadStatus wxDownloadThread::GetStatus (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the current status of the thread.

please note that this status is completely independent from the running/paused status of a simple wxThread. The returned status refers only to the action currently performed by wxDownloadThread when it's running.

bool wxDownloadThread::IsComputingMD5 (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if this thread is computing the MD5 file checksum.

bool wxDownloadThread::IsDownloading (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if this thread is downloading a file.

We don't need to use m_mDownloading since we are just reading the #m_bDownloading var...

bool wxDownloadThread::IsWaiting (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if this thread is running but it's not downloading anything.
